Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient describes Body Aches. pt is a male retired aged 70 yrs. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 102.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.
